_comment: This file is the authoritative source of truth for task execution state. The markdown plan file is read-only reference documentation. Use status-cli.js to update task status.
planName: Implementation Plan: Git Workflow Phase 4 - Advanced Features

tasks.notes: Already implemented in commit 12c0559. Verified: --pr flag documented on lines 15, 386+

tasks.description: Implement branch push: `git push -u origin plan/{name}`
tasks.notes: Already implemented in commit 12c0559. Verified: git push -u origin on lines 449-465

tasks.description: Generate PR description from plan summary
tasks.notes: Already implemented in commit 12c0559. Verified: PR description generation on lines 485-577
Already implemented in commit 12c0559. Verified: gh pr create on lines 584-646
Already implemented in commit 12c0559. Verified: --draft option on lines 16, 619-636
Already implemented in commit 12c0559. Verified: PR_URL capture on lines 642-644, displayed as 'View PR: URL', stored in status.json on line 686
Already implemented in commit 12c0559. Verified: Step PR.5 on lines 670-689 explicitly skips Steps 7-11 (local merge). Decision flowchart on lines 691-722 shows PR vs local merge paths.
Already implemented in commit 12c0559. Verified: --pr (14 occurrences), --draft (8 occurrences), gh pr create (3 occurrences)

tasks.description: Implement push after branch creation in `/plan:set`
tasks.notes: Added section 3.0.4 to /plan:set for pushing branch to remote after creation

tasks.description: Implement push after each commit in `/plan:implement`
tasks.notes: Added section 6.2 to /plan:implement for pushing after each task commit

tasks.description: Add `--push` flag for manual push trigger
tasks.notes: Added --push flag documentation to /plan:set and /plan:implement

tasks.description: Handle push failures gracefully (warn, don't fail task)
tasks.notes: Graceful push failure handling already included in tasks 2.2 and 2.3 implementations
Added Remote Sync section to git-utilities.md with configuration, behavior, and failure handling documentation

tasks.description: Add automatic phase tagging after VERIFY tasks
tasks.notes: Added section 9 to /plan:verify for automatic phase tagging after status updates
Added Phase Tags section to git-utilities.md with tag format specification

tasks.description: Include phase name in tag annotation
tasks.notes: Tag annotation includes phase name in first line plus metadata (plan, phase number, task count, timestamp)

tasks.description: Add phase tags to status display
tasks.notes: Added section 3b for detecting phase tags, updated display examples to show tag indicator

tasks.description: Use phase tags in `/plan:rollback phase` command
tasks.notes: Added Step 0 to phase rollback for using phase tags, updated examples to show tag-based vs commit-based rollback
Added --push-tags flag to /plan:verify argument table, flag detection, examples, and updated git-utilities.md documentation
Created .claude/commands/plan/cleanup.md with command structure, argument parsing, and configuration loading

tasks.description: List stale plan branches (configurable age, default 30 days)
tasks.notes: Stale branch listing implemented in cleanup.md section 3 - uses configurable cleanup_age_days (default 30), includes both local and remote-only branches

tasks.description: Show branch age and last commit info
tasks.notes: Branch age and last commit display implemented in cleanup.md section 4 - shows age in days, commit hash, and commit message

tasks.description: Add `--delete` flag to remove listed branches
Add `--archive` flag to tag before delete
tasks.notes: Already implemented in cleanup.md section 6 - creates archive tags with format archive/plan/{branch-name} before deletion, with annotated metadata
Enhanced confirmation prompt in section 5 step 2 - uses AskUserQuestion with warning text, cancel option, and archive notification

tasks.description: Handle both local and remote branches
tasks.notes: Enhanced branch handling to explicitly support all three scenarios: local+remote, local-only, remote-only. Updated deletion logic, archive mode, and summary reporting.
Added archive_retention_days configuration (default 90 days) to cleanup.md
Added section 7 to cleanup.md for listing expired archive tags based on retention period

tasks.description: Add cleanup command for old archives
tasks.notes: Added section 8 for deleting expired archive tags with confirmation, updated report summary
Added --keep-archives flag to skip archive tag cleanup
Added comprehensive Archive Retention Policy documentation section

tasks.description: Offer resolution options: rebase, manual resolve, abort

tasks.notes: Already implemented. --force flag documented on line 17, implementation on lines 267-279.
Created .claude/git-workflow.json with all configuration options and schema

tasks.description: Define configuration schema with all options
tasks.notes: Defined schema with 10 options: strategy, branch_prefix, auto_commit, merge_strategy, archive_branches, archive_retention_days, sync_remote, phase_tags, enforce_branch, cleanup_age_days
Added config loading patterns in git-utilities.md with Bash and Node.js implementations

tasks.description: Add default values for all options
tasks.notes: Added default values for all options in both config file and loading functions
Already documented in: git-workflow.json _schema section (lines 16-70), git-utilities.md Configuration Options Reference (lines 704-717), with examples in both files.
Added Configuration Validation section to git-utilities.md with Node.js and Bash validation patterns, validation behavior, example output, and integration pattern.
Added strategy option support to set.md, implement.md, and git-utilities.md. Supports branch-per-plan and branch-per-phase strategies with configurable branch prefixes.
Implemented branch_prefix configuration in set.md, implement.md, and git-utilities.md. Updated isOnPlanBranch() and getPlanBranchName() to respect configured prefix.
Added auto_commit configuration check to implement.md. When disabled, skips auto-commit and informs user. Added documentation in git-utilities.md.
Updated complete.md to load merge_strategy from config with command-line override. Added comprehensive documentation in git-utilities.md with strategy details and selection guide.

Updated complete.md to load archive_branches from config with --no-archive override. Added comprehensive documentation in git-utilities.md including purpose, configuration, command-line override, and use cases.

Already implemented. archive_retention_days configured in git-workflow.json (line 10), loading in cleanup.md (line 57), documented in git-utilities.md (lines 712, 730, 761, 785-789, 849, 897-899, 1295).

Already implemented. sync_remote configured in git-workflow.json (line 11), loading/usage in set.md (lines 219-269), implement.md (lines 678-726), verify.md (lines 530-533), and full documentation in git-utilities.md (lines 379-489, 713, 762, 769-773).
Already implemented. phase_tags configured in git-workflow.json (line 12), loading/usage in verify.md (lines 572-578), and full documentation in git-utilities.md (lines 714, 732, 763, 777-781, 840).

Implemented enforce_branch option: added config loading to implement.md and batch.md, when true (default) fails on non-plan branches with clear error, when false warns but continues. Added comprehensive documentation section in git-utilities.md.

tasks.description: Update VISION.md with git workflow section
tasks.notes: Updated VISION.md Git Integration section with comprehensive git workflow documentation covering branch management, automatic commits, remote sync, configuration, and safety features
Created comprehensive troubleshooting guide at docs/guides/git-workflow-troubleshooting.md covering branch issues, remote sync, merge conflicts, configuration, cleanup, commits, and status tracking
Added 6 workflow diagrams to git-utilities.md: Plan Lifecycle Flow, PR Creation Flow, Remote Sync Flow, Conflict Detection Flow, Branch Cleanup Flow, and Phase Tag Workflow

tasks.description: Document all new commands and options
tasks.notes: Created comprehensive command reference at docs/guides/git-workflow-commands.md documenting /plan:set, /plan:implement, /plan:verify, /plan:complete, /plan:cleanup, /plan:rollback with all flags and configuration options

Created examples guide at docs/guides/git-workflow-examples.md with 10 real-world scenarios: solo developer, team PR workflow, phase-by-phase, CI/CD integration, recovery, custom prefix, manual commits, conflict resolution, cleanup, parallel plans, plus configuration presets

tasks.description: Test full workflow with PR creation
tasks.notes: All 10 test cases passed. PR creation workflow fully documented with --pr flag, --draft flag, gh CLI integration, PR description generation, and proper error handling.
All 10 test cases passed. Remote sync fully implemented with sync_remote config, --push flag, graceful error handling, and comprehensive documentation.
All 15 test cases passed. /plan:cleanup fully implemented with stale branch detection, archive tag cleanup, safety features, and comprehensive documentation.
All 13 test cases passed. Conflict detection fully implemented with dry-run merge, 3 resolution options (rebase/manual/abort), --force flag, and comprehensive documentation.

All 17 test cases passed. All 10 configuration options verified: strategy, branch_prefix, auto_commit, merge_strategy, archive_branches, archive_retention_days, sync_remote, phase_tags, enforce_branch, cleanup_age_days. Schema documented, defaults work, validation handles errors gracefully.

All 10 tests PASSED. Verified backwards compatibility: all commands work with default values when .claude/git-workflow.json doesn't exist. Defensive defaults, error suppression, and consistent behavior confirmed.
